description: This file sets up the routing endpoints for transaction-related API calls in an Express.js application. It imports necessary controller functions and defines routes for listing, creating, updating, deleting transactions, and getting a summary.

methods.name: listTransactions
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list all transactions.

methods.name: createTransaction
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new transaction.

methods.name: updateTransaction
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update an existing transaction by ID.

methods.name: deleteTransaction
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a transaction by ID.

methods.name: getSummary
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a summary of transactions.
